original_text: Those bad spirits are the spirits of demons. They had the power to do miracles. They went to all the rulers in the whole world, to bring them together to fight in a big war. That war will happen on the great day of God, who has all power and authority.
korean_text: 그들은 귀신의 영이라 이적을 행하여 온 천하 왕들에게 가서 하나님 곧 전능하신 이의 큰 날에 있을 전쟁을 위하여 그들을 모으더라

sentences.original_text: Those bad spirits are the spirits of demons.
They had the power to do miracles.
They went to all the rulers in the whole world,
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 온 세상의 모든 통치자에게 갔다.

sentences.original_text: to bring them together to fight in a big war.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들을 모아 큰 전쟁에서 싸우게 하기 위해.

sentences.original_text: That war will happen on the great day of God,
sentences.korean_translation: 그 전쟁은 하나님의 위대한 날에 일어날 것이다.

sentences.original_text: who has all power and authority.
